name: Meditate on That
description:
My first Game Jam Game! Made for the Trijam #203 3 hour Game Jam!

Finished in 4 hours hahaha but I'm still happy with what I Did

The Theme was "The Cycle Is Broken" So I made a game where you have to stop a monks meditation cycle from being broken by "Impure" thoughts!

Chime Sound effect from Freesound.org
